thread.title: Barbara J.
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Barbara J.

author: Barbara J.
title: Barbara J.
text: This was my first time using Frames Direct and it was the easiest eyeglass purchase ever! Placing the order was quick & efficient. I received my glasses earlier than expected; they are perfect, and I love them! I will definitely use Frames Direct again and highly recommend them to others.
